max.desc: Number of last page (must be higher than 'min')

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color (useful when you are using it along with the 'input' prop)

size.desc: Button size in CSS units, including unit name

input.desc: Use an input instead of buttons

icon-prev.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

icon-next.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

icon-first.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

icon-last.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

to-fn.desc: Generate link for page buttons; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

returns.desc: Object or String that can be passed to a <router-link> as `to` parameter

boundary-numbers.desc: Always show first and last page buttons (if not using 'input')

ellipses.desc: Show ellipses (...) when pages are available

max-pages.desc: Maximum number of page links to display at a time; 0 means Infinite

flat.desc: Use 'flat' design for non-active buttons (it's the default option)

color.desc: Color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the non-active buttons

text-color.desc: Text color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE buttons

active-design.desc: The design of the ACTIVE button, similar to the flat/outline/push/unelevated props (but those are used for non-active buttons)

active-color.desc: Color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE button

active-text-color.desc: Text color name from the Quasar Color Palette for the ACTIVE button

round.desc: Makes a circle shaped button for all buttons

rounded.desc: Applies a more prominent border-radius for a squared shape button for all buttons

glossy.desc: Applies a glossy effect for all buttons

gutter.desc: Apply custom gutter; Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

padding.desc: Apply custom padding (vertical [horizontal]); Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl); Also removes the min width and height when set

input-style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the input (if using one)

input-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the input (if using one)

ripple.desc: Configure buttons material ripple (disable it by setting it to 'false' or supply a config object); Does not applies to boundary and ellipsis buttons
examples: { early: true, center: true, color: 'teal', keyCodes: [] }

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model

set.desc: Go directly to the specified page

offset.desc: Offset page, can be negative or positive
